name: Your package Arrived
description:
READ BEFORE PLAY!!

please ignore the spelling mistakes in the game or in this text

Story

You are a Postman and you have to deliver packages in the town.

WHEN YOU START THE GAME IT WILL SAY THERE WAS AN ERROR, IGNORE THAT!! How To Play You HAVE to start by entering the building behind you at spawn. 

That is the Post Office you can pick up packages there. To move you use the arrows ➡⬅⬆⬇ and interact with space or clicking or enter. After you picked up a package deliver it and then return to the post office and talk to the guy who gave you the package, you will get 2$ reward.

At the blue hat guy you can buy coat/gloves/hat wich will increse the time that you can be outside.

More stuff you have further you can go.

You can go into any house but only some of those will make you warm up(reset time left counter).

To save press ESC then select save.

ENJOY! //INSTALL HELP

Download the zip, extract find the Game.exe inside of the extracted folder lauch it, ignore the error messages.

DONE.

CREDITS

Ady Studios AKA me AKA Adam Kara
